subject: Re: [junit] File with results
msgSnippet: ... 1. Use Ant to run your tests, and Ant will do it for you. 2. Customize the test runner to print results to a file, rather than the console. Read the source
messageBody:
Elaine Prata wrote:

> How can I do for create a file with test results after run the test suite?

1. Use Ant to run your tests, and Ant will do it for you.
2. Customize the test runner to print results to a file, rather than the
console. Read the source code for details; it's not that scary.

Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
